segments.text: I feel so bad for the woman, she’s going to have a huge mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip on the wet floor and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is risking a fall, and it’s heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not realizing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just so unfortunate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets, and she won’t even see it coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would help her before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
